Text:
DoD never had any DRM. If there is a crack you are being tricked and should be very worried.

Check the forums to the game so you can see how many awesome mods there are.

And please consider buying it if you have the whopping $10 USD it costs to buy the game and all expansions.

By the way, this is missing the final patch released a few days ago. 1.1.2 is current.

http://community.gaslampgames.com/

@OmniNegro 
Your... A bit of an odd one ain't ye? =/

Better than being unoriginal and uncreative. :)

But what are you getting at?
10$? These devs are crazy. I'm adding this game to my list of 1st paycheck games.
